#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(){
      long long i,j,n,a[100001],x,y,min[10001];
      cin>>n;
      cin>>x>>y;
      for(i=0;i<n;i++){
           cin>>a[i];
           a[i]=a[i]-1;
      }
      x=y-x;
      sort(a,a+n);
      for(i=0;i<=x;i++)
          min[i]=100000000;
      min[0]=0;
      for(i=1;i<=x;i++){
          for(j=0;j<n;j++){
              if(a[j]>i)
                  break;
              else if(a[j]<=i && min[i-a[j]]+1<min[i])
                  min[i]=min[i-a[j]]+1;
          }
      }
      if(min[x]<100000000)
            cout<<"POSSIBLE\n";
      else
            cout<<"IMPOSSIBLE\n";
              
      return 0;
}
